help_music_description:
**Playback Control**
ğŸ”— `/connect` - Connect to voice channel
<:play:1399719809469382779> `/play [song/link]` - Play music
<:pause:1399721118473912390> `/pause` - Pause/resume
<:skip:1399719807699521597> `/skip` - Skip to next song
âŒ `/disconnect` - Leave voice channel

**Volume & Queue**
ğŸ”Š `/volume [1-1000]` - Adjust volume
ğŸ“‹ `/queue` - Check queue
<:shuffle:1399720936068091964>`/shuffle` - Toggle shuffle mode
<:repeats:1399721836958449674> `/repeat` - Toggle repeat mode

**Advanced Features**
ğŸ¯ `/nowplaying` - Current song info
â° `/seek [Â±sec]` - Adjust playback position
âŒ `/remove [number]` - Remove song from queue
welcome_description:

help_language_description:
`/language` - List available language packs
`/language [language_code]` - Apply language pack
music_already_connected_voice_channel: :white_check_mark: | I'm already on the voice channel!
music_no_playing_music: There are no music currently playing!
music_input_over_vol: :loud_sound: | The volume is limited to 1% to 1000%!

music_not_in_voice_channel_description: To play music, you need to join a voice channel first. Please click on one of the voice channels on the left to join.
music_not_in_voice_channel_footer: Please use the command again after joining a voice channel.
music_not_connected_voice_channel: :warning: | You are not connected to the voice channel!
music_no_permission: :warning: | Permission Denied! (Give me Connect, Speak permission!)
music_come_in_my_voice_channel: :warning: | You're on another voice channel! Please come to my voice channel.
other_invite_title: **Invite me to the server you own!**
other_invite_description: Thank you very much! Click [here]({link}) to invite me to your server!
set_language_pack_list: Please select one of the following language packs
set_language_pack_not_exist: The language file does not exist!
music_search_select: Select a song to play from the list below
music_queue_cleared_desc: {count} songs have been removed from the queue.
music_no_music_in_queue: There is no music in the queue.
